Section.name: Highlighted Additions/Changes
Section.p: This release contains the following significant updates and extensions to the SIF specification.

ul.li: StudentScoreJudgementAgainstStandard/Grade, StudentScoreJudgementAgainstStandard/TeacherJudgement, requested by DET NSW, to allow a broader range of evaluations for student performance against a learning standard than just a numeric score.
4217 Currency Names And Code Elements: added SLE: Leone (new).

Federal Electorate: added 194: No usual address (NSW), 294: No usual address (VIC), 394: No usual address (QLD), 494: No usual address (SA), 594: No usual address (WA), 694: No usual address (TAS), 794: No usual address (NT), 894: No usual address (ACT), 897: Migratory - Offshore - Shipping (ACT), 994: No usual address (OT), 997: Migratory - Offshore - Shipping (OT)

Removed Australian Standard Geographical Classification (ASGC) (obsoleted in 2012, is by far the largest codeset in the specification at 1300 elements). All references to it in the specification (SchoolInfo/SLA, LEAInfo/SLA) replaced with xs:token.
Visa Sub Class: tidied presentation, use consistently "(No longer isssued)" for discontinued visas.
Visa Sub Class: updated enumeration of discontinued visas.
Federal Electorate: corrected 227: Lalor, 228: La Trobe to 227: La Trobe, 228: Lalor, following the published Australian Bureau of Statistics specification.
Federal Electorate: corrected 515: Swan, 516: Tangney to 514: Swan, 515: Tangney, following the published Australian Bureau of Statistics specification.
